description:
Video Flood allows you to download the video broadcasts directly to your phone as well as stream them! Swiftly download videos when your around Wi-Fi and have them to view whenever. You can also Facebook, Email and Copy the video URL/Links.  As of this release, Video Flood has compiled 188 video broadcasts, containing thousands of videos, and enabled them to be viewed through your phone’s video player.  To achieve optimal download and stream performance stable Wi-Fi is required. 

Videos offered range from two minute highlights to hour shows. The videos within the broadcasts update daily to monthly. You can also watch past videos. All the broadcasts have been tested, to insure smooth playback through the phone's video player whether downloaded or streamed. New video broadcasts are added through new version releases/updates. 

BROADCAST CATEGORIES:  (188 Total Broadcasts) 

NEWS- 25 Broadcasts - Featured: ABC World News & NBC Today 
SHOWBIZ - 11 Broadcasts - Featured: OK! Insider & Chelsea Lately
ENTERTAINMENT - 21 Broadcasts - Featured:  Diggnation & G4 TV Web Shows 
SCIENCE - 14 Broadcasts - Featured:  Discovery News
HEALTH & FITNESS - 12 Broadcasts - Featured: Yogamazing
TECHNOLOGY - 14 Broadcasts - Featured:  CNET & Tekzilla 
CARS - 9 Broadcasts - Featured:  Fast Lane Daily 
LEARNING - 16 Broadcasts - Featured:  Lynda & Fora TV 
FOOD AND DRINK - 11 Broadcasts - Featured:  Basic Brewing
VIDEO GAMES & COMICS - 12 Broadcasts - Featured:  Gamespot & X Plays 
TRAVEL AND FASHION - 9 Broadcasts - Featured:  H&M Fashion
PRO & EXTREME SPORTS – 14 Broadcasts - Featured:  The Basketball Jones & Skateboard Mag 
BUSINESS - 12 Broadcasts - Featured:  Mad Money & Option Actions
POLITICS - 13 Broadcasts - Featured:   Morning Joe & Democracy Now! 
NATURE & ANIMALS - 10 Broadcasts - Featured:  Animal Planet & NASA Earth 

Legal Notice:  All content, trademarks, trade-names and logos are property of the respected parties/owners.
versionNote: Updated Morning Joe & Meet the Press broadcasts
